How do I do it?!@: how do I get windows to stack like in windows
I want it to only occupy onespace
and when i click it I can select which firefox window I have
how do I turn window "stacking" on?
are you talking about the task manager?
at the bottom you have a task manager, where you have all the running applications .... you want those application to be grouped by program
as far as I know you cant do that in gnome, but you can in KDE (using Kubuntu)
you can do that in gnome
right click on the taskbar and choose preferences
you'll find a small space with dots at the right of the taskbar
right-click at the left of the leftmost application on the taskbar
you have grouping windows preferences in there
